title: ID this typeface?
content:
Awful. I’m aware.

But I still need to know what typeface this is. Any thoughts?

Thanks much!

[http://i4.tinypic.com/89loqv8.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112248/http:/i4.tinypic.com/89loqv8.gif "http://i4.tinypic.com/89loqv8.gif")

 [‹ font similar "livinghome"](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112248/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39436 "Go to previous forum topic") [Gmunder Tagespost Typefaces ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112248/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39438 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mister_eaves

comments.content:
Centaur?

Metropolitan?

Can’t be too sure, it’s stretched a bit

Definitely [Centaur](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112248/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/centaur_mt_std/?sample_text=ALLEN%20BROTHERS&sample_size=36&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) with fake small caps and [squooshing](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112248/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/squoosh).
